column4: CrescendoI think amarok does automatic naming, but don't quote me on that.

so do most other players, by the CDDB database - which isn't the best at figuring out what song it is.  Maybe I'm looking for some sort of MP3 signature comparison application?  It fingerprints the MP3, and compares it to a database somewhere?
I gave you as much of a hint as I can give :)  IDK, I tend to label all my music as I add it, if it doesn't already come with a good label.
yeah, so do I, but in a data transfer it seems they all got FUBARed, one way or another. :/
